Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 41st overall pick, by Halifax in 1977...
Injured on 7/19/1977 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 9/28/1980, off Silvio Barettes (TRO)...
Released by Halifax on 4/21/1981...
Signed as a free agent by Penn on 2/1/1982 to a 2-year deal worth $450,000 per year...
Injured on 7/6/1983 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/22/1986 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/19/1990 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
